metadata.name: Sesame Street
metadata.summary: A widely recognized and perpetually daring experiment in educational children's programming.
metadata.description: Sesame Street provides a comprehensive curriculum that supports preschoolers' cognitive, social, emotional, and physical development. Children learn to use their imaginations, build social skills, and respect people’s differences
metadata.keywords: PBS, PBS KIDS, kids, children, children's programming, cartoons, educational, reading
